sect2.title: Installation of Sh-utils
sect2.para: Install Shellutils by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install && cd /usr/bin && mv basename date echo false hostname /bin && mv pwd sleep stty su test true uname /bin && mv chroot ../sbin

sect2.title: FHS compliance notes
sect2.para: There is a command installed in this package which is named test. It is often used in shell scripts to evaluate conditions, but is more often encountered in the form of [ condition ].
